Authors:
Mélanie Thomas, Lise Pingault, Axel Poulet, Mickaël
throude, Jorge Duarte, Sébastien Faure, jean-Philippe Pichon, Etienne
Paux, aline valeska Probst, Christophe Tatout
Title:
Evolutionary history of Methyltransferase 1 genes in
hexaploid wheat
Keywords:
DNA methylation, Evolution, Genome dynamics, CG-rich
isochores
Abstract:
Background: Plant and animal methyltransferases are key
enzymes with DNA methylation maintenance activity at cytosine residues,
required for gene expression control and genome stability. Taking
advantage of the new sequence surveys of the wheat genome recently
released by the International Wheat Genome Sequencing Consortium, we
identified and characterized MET1 genes in hexaploid wheat Triticum
aestivum (TaMET1).

trees.title: Methyltransferase 1 genes in hexaploid wheat PAML
Methyltransferase 1 genes in hexaploid wheat MLT
